pullrequest.title: Word-wrapping in treeviews and item views, adapted from David Meyer's implementation.

content.raw:
Since I’m the impetus for this particular change I’m happy to do some testing.

First up, I can confirm it works with Qt 5.6.2.

Second, this is interacting strangely with the sequence\_index changes. If you click to add a global, but change your mind and add nothing you get hit with a “ is not a valid Python variable name” pop-up. This does not happen at tag 2.4.0. 

Third, if the column widths can’t be resized manually, it would probably be good to add some buffer pixels to the width like we do the height for ascetics.

I can do some more testing but I’m actually having a bunch of trouble with the sequence\_index changes that I’m having to work around at the moment. I’ll get back to it once that gets figured out.
